original_text: Then Saul broke off his pursuit of David and went to meet the Philistines. That is why they call this place Sela Hammahlekoth.
korean_text: 이에 사울이 다윗 뒤쫓기를 그치고 돌아와 블레셋 사람들을 치러 갔으므로 그 곳을 셀라하마느곳이라 칭하니라

sentences.original_text: Then Saul broke off his pursuit of David
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사울은 다윗을 추격하는 것을 멈췄고

sentences.original_text: and went to meet the Philistines
That is why they call this place Sela Hammahlekoth
